name: Vasta Solutions
description:
Vatsa Solutions is a truly global, end-to-end Software Services organization. We provide guaranteed, efficient, and extremely cost-effective software solutions to enterprises worldwide, using an onsite-offshore delivery model. We demonstrated ourselves by meeting and exceeding customer expectations in the delivery of these services. Our customer-centric belief establishes a value proposition focused on long-term relationships and delivery of value added services.
Vatsa is staffed by talented and committed professionals and has achieved appreciation from our customers for providing quality solutions consistently, flexibly and cost effectively.
Vatsa is a privately held group and the leadership consists of a young professional management team who, together with our worldwide consultants, take great pride in delivering to the goals of our esteemed clients.
